mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_car (c_title, c_ddate, c_dtime, c_ddis, c_edate, c_etime, c_edis, c_place, c_cost) VALUES (#{c_title}, #{c_ddate}, #{c_dtime}, #{c_ddis}, #{c_edate}, #{c_etime}, #{c_edis}, #{c_place}, #{c_cost})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_car SET c_title = #{c_title}, c_ddate = #{c_ddate}, c_dtime = #{c_dtime}, c_ddis = #{c_ddis}, c_edate = #{c_edate}, c_etime = #{c_etime}, c_edis = #{c_edis}, c_place = #{c_place}, c_cost = #{c_cost} WHERE c_no = #{c_no}
